name: Escape of Pinball
description:
Act so that your enemies won't find you, sometimes shoot, run away, score goals and clear the stage!
Test your skills in arcade mode and time attack!
Arcade mode is a mode that aims to clear the stage so that the determined remaining lives is not lost.
For time attack, aim for the goal faster and set the fastest clear time on the stage!

---- Method of operation -----
WASD key: Move
Left click: Shoot bullets
M key: Menu display
Space key: Display of stage time
